publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3239 Hugh Henry: The Draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*

S2M-3239 Hugh Henry: The Draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) (Scotland) Order 2005—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Criminal Justice Act 1988 (Offensive Weapons) (Scotland) Order 2005 be approved.Supported by: Cathy Jamieson
